properties.name: ManifestWindowSeconds
properties.description: The total duration (in seconds) of each manifest. Minimum value: 30 seconds. Maximum value: 3600 seconds.

type.description: The total duration (in seconds) of each manifest. Minimum value: 30 seconds. Maximum value: 3600 seconds.

properties.name: MinBufferTimeSeconds
properties.description: Minimum amount of content (measured in seconds) that a player must keep available in the buffer. Minimum value: 2 seconds. Maximum value: 60 seconds.

type.description: Minimum amount of content (measured in seconds) that a player must keep available in the buffer. Minimum value: 2 seconds. Maximum value: 60 seconds.

properties.name: MinUpdatePeriodSeconds
properties.description: Minimum amount of time (in seconds) that the player should wait before requesting updates to the manifest. Minimum value: 2 seconds. Maximum value: 60 seconds.

type.description: Minimum amount of time (in seconds) that the player should wait before requesting updates to the manifest. Minimum value: 2 seconds. Maximum value: 60 seconds.

properties.name: SuggestedPresentationDelaySeconds
properties.description: Amount of time (in seconds) that the player should be from the live point at the end of the manifest. Minimum value: 2 seconds. Maximum value: 60 seconds.

type.description: Amount of time (in seconds) that the player should be from the live point at the end of the manifest. Minimum value: 2 seconds. Maximum value: 60 seconds.

properties.name: ManifestWindowSeconds
properties.description: The total duration (in seconds) of each manifest. Minimum value: 30 seconds. Maximum value: 3600 seconds.

type.description: The total duration (in seconds) of each manifest. Minimum value: 30 seconds. Maximum value: 3600 seconds.

properties.name: AdMarkupType
properties.description: Determines the type of SCTE 35 tags to use in ad markup. Specify DATERANGE to use DATERANGE tags (for live or VOD content). Specify SCTE35_ENHANCED to use EXT-X-CUE-OUT and EXT-X-CUE-IN tags (for VOD content only).

type.description: Determines the type of SCTE 35 tags to use in ad markup. Specify DATERANGE to use DATERANGE tags (for live or VOD content). Specify SCTE35_ENHANCED to use EXT-X-CUE-OUT and EXT-X-CUE-IN tags (for VOD content only).

properties.name: ManifestName
properties.description: The name of the manifest for the channel. The name appears in the PlaybackUrl.

type.description: The name of the manifest for the channel. The name appears in the PlaybackUrl.

properties.name: SourceGroup
properties.description: A string used to match which HttpPackageConfiguration is used for each VodSource.

type.description: A string used to match which HttpPackageConfiguration is used for each VodSource.

properties.name: SourceLocationName
properties.description: The name of the source location where the slate VOD source is stored.

type.description: The name of the source location where the slate VOD source is stored.

properties.name: VodSourceName
properties.description: The slate VOD source name. The VOD source must already exist in a source location before it can be used for slate.

type.description: The slate VOD source name. The VOD source must already exist in a source location before it can be used for slate.

properties.name: Tags
properties.description: The tags to assign to the channel.

type.description: The tags to assign to the channel.
